headline: Assessing Medtronic (MDT) Valuation After Mixed Recent Share Performance
summary: Medtronic stock at a glance after recent performance Medtronic (MDT) has seen a 0.4% gain over the past day, while returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months have been negative, creating a mixed backdrop for investors. See our latest analysis for Medtronic. Putting that in context, Medtronic’s 1 year total shareholder return of 10.3% contrasts with a small 1 year to date share price gain of 1%. This suggests recent momentum has cooled after stronger returns when dividends are...
